Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Siththaththinaale Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Apposthalanaagiya Pavul, Ebesuvile Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Visuvaasigalaayirukkira Parisuththavaangalukku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
2 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum, Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum, Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.
3 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukku Sthoththiram; Avar Kiristhuvukkul Unnadhangalile Aavikkuriya Sagala Aaseervaadhaththinaalum Nammai Aaseervadhiththirukkiraar.
4 thamakkumunbaaga Naam Anbil Parisuththamullavargalum Kutramillaadhavargalumaayiruppadharku, Avar Ulagaththotraththukku Munne Kiristhuvukkul Nammaith Therindhukondapadiye,
5 piriyamaanavarukkul Thaam Namakkuth Thandharulina Thammudaiya Kirubaiyin Magimaikkup Pugazhchchiyaaga,
6 thammudaiya Dhayavulla Siththaththinpadiye, Nammai Yesukiristhumoolamaaith Thamakku Suvigaarabuththiraraagumpadi Mun Kuriththirukkiraar.
7 avarudaiya Kirubaiyin Aisuvariyaththinpadiye, Ivarudaiya Raththaththinaale Paavamannippaagiya Meetpu Ivarukkul Namakku Undaayirukkiradhu.
8 andhak Kirubaiyai Avar Sagala Gnaanaththodum Puththiyodum Engalidaththil Perugappanninaar.
9 kaalangal Niraiverumbodhu Vilangum Niyamaththinpadi Paralogaththilirukkiravaigalum Boologaththilirukkiravaigalumaagiya Sagalamum Kiristhuvukkulle Koottappadavendumendru,
10 thamakkulle Theermaaniththirundha Thammudaiya Dhayavulla Siththaththin Ragasiyaththai Engalukku Ariviththaar.
11 melum Kiristhuvinmel Munne Nambikkaiyaayirundha Naangal Avarudaiya Magimaikkup Pugazhchchiyaayirukkumpadikku,

12 thamadhu Siththaththin Aalosanaikkuththakkadhaaga Ellaavatraiyum Nadappikkira Avarudaiya Theermaanaththinpadiye, Naangal Munkurikkappattu, Kiristhuvukkul Avarudaiya Sudhandharamaagumpadi Therindhukollappattom.
13 neengalum Ungal Ratchippin Suviseshamaagiya Saththiya Vasanaththaik Kettu, Visuvaasigalaanabodhu, Vaakkuththaththampannappatta Parisuththa Aaviyaal Avarukkul Muththiraipodappatteergal.
14 avarukku Sondhamaanavargal Avarudaiya Magimaikkup Pugazhchchiyaaga Meetkappaduvaargal Enbadharku Aaviyaanavar Nammudaiya Sudhandharaththin Achchaaramaayirukkiraar.
15 aanapadiyinaale, Karththaraagiya Yesuvinmelulla Ungal Visuvaasaththaiyum, Parisuththavaangalellaarmelulla Ungal Anbaiyunkuriththu Naan Kelvippattu,
16 idaividaamal Ungalukkaaga Sthoththirampanni, En Jebangalil Ungalai Ninaiththu,

17 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Dhevanum Magimaiyin Pidhaavumaanavar Thammai Neengal Arindhukolvadharkaana Gnaanaththaiyum Thelivaiyum Alikkira Aaviyai Ungalukkuth Thandharulavendumendrum,
18 thaam Nammai Azhaiththadhinaale Namakku Undaayirukkira Nambikkai Innadhendrum, Parisuththavaangalidaththil Thamakku Undaayirukkira Sudhandharaththinudaiya Magimaiyin Aisuvariyam Innadhendrum;

19 thaam Kiristhuvai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppi, Avaridaththil Nadappiththa Thamadhu Balaththa Saththuvaththin Vallamaippadiye Visuvaasikkiravargalaagiya Nammidaththile Kaanbikkum Thammudaiya Vallamaiyin Magaa Menmaiyaana Magaththuvam Innadhendrum, Neengal Ariyumpadikku, Avar Ungalukkup Piragaasamulla Manakkangalaik Kodukkavendumendrum Vendikkollugiren.

20 ellaath Dhuraiththanaththukkum, Adhigaaraththukkum, Vallamaikkum, Karththaththuvaththukkum, Immaiyilmaaththiramalla Marumaiyilum Perpetrirukkum Ellaa Naamaththukkum Melaai Avar Uyarndhirukkaththakkadhaaga,
21 avarai Unnadhangalil Thammudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Utkaarumpadi Seydhu,
22 ellaavatraiyum Avarudaiya Paadhangalukkuk Keezhppaduththi,
23 ellaavatraiyum Ellaavatraalum Nirappugiravarudaiya Niraivaagiya Sareeramaana Sabaikku Avarai Ellaavatrirkum Melaana Thalaiyaagath Thandharulinaar.
